website_summaries.verdict: A terrific fillet table that comes with a stamped-in sink, faucet, and drain assembly attached.
pros: Consists of food-grade plastic that ensures the table is built to last
Includes a stainless steel faucet with garden hose attachment
Foldable design ensures seamless storage and transport
cons: More expensive than other comparable tables

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to take camping as an outdoor wash station and it works great! Only thing I wish is that it came with a travel bag of some kind. When being stored, it’s hard to keep the faucet and pieces all together. I put it all in a gallon-size ziplock and taped it to the underside which seeks to work for now but a travel/carry bag would be awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay W.

customer_reviews.title: Great table but unfortunately missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: After researching many I bought this as a gift for my adult son and it was well received. The height is the best I've seen so you don't have to bend over to use. Only problem was the first time out of the box to use today it was missing a screw for the drain. Hardware store closed so found a makeshift screw to place the drain. Would appreciate if seller could send us the right screw for the table drain.
customer_reviews.author: SandyJack

customer_reviews.title: Not for Nannies and 3-year olds!
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year old granddaughter and I had trouble putting this together! Luckily my daughter and son-in-law had no problem! I bought this to use as a hand-washing station outside the chicken coop! It is awesome for this purpose. I actually wish all my counters and tables were this height!
customer_reviews.author: D. Silverheels

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT ITEM for those who fish or do canning
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT ITEM for those who fish or do canning. We take it with us on all our many fishing trips and my wife uses it when canning also. Easy to sit up and use.
customer_reviews.author: jimmie moore

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product...it was a big hit at my small backyard gathering. Everyone loved it, didn't take long to put together, and it worked like a regular sink. My guests even took pictures of it!
customer_reviews.author: GRACE

customer_reviews.title: Solid table but tall
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for camping. Very sturdy but very tall! If you're short like me it might be a bit too tall of a table. I can still grill with my weber Q on the table but I wish it was shorter. Other than that, very solid table.
customer_reviews.author: E. H.

customer_reviews.title: Faucet Location
customer_reviews.text: You could not do a worse job of placing the faucet opening in relation to the legs if you actually set out to place it in the worst possible spot. It is very difficult to tighten everything. All they had to do is move the legs 1/2 inch.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Using it as a grill side prep station and backyard sink, perfect, love it
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once but worked perfect. Took it camping and made cleaning the fish we caught a breeze. Clean up was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmyb

customer_reviews.title: Can be used in Garden too
customer_reviews.text: This works great in a Community Garden as a place to wash vegetables and your hands.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stansel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for filleting fish ..
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my dad as a Christmas present so much easier for filleting fish... he loves it
customer_reviews.author: AMIE C

customer_reviews.title: Nice study table
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table because of the height most of other tables were short.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa_Rae

customer_reviews.title: Corner of table cracked
customer_reviews.text: Received table with cracked corner. It is a little difficult to install the faucet and to store when not in use ( I use it for camp kitchen)
customer_reviews.author: Bob Klein

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install faucet and no leg levelers
customer_reviews.text: Concept is cool but not practical if you plan to camp with it, set up and tear down all the time. Next to impossible to hook up faucet, its in a incredibly tight space. And there are no leg levelers on it which is a big pain
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: My daughter liked it so much I think she is planning on ...
customer_reviews.text: We used this table to clean chili's outside and save making such a mess in the kitchen sink. My daughter liked it so much I think she is planning on getting one for her husband to clean fish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product was damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Product was damage on two corners and had scratches like used item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: still nice table but I really only got this one for ...
customer_reviews.text: Sent me different table. Different faucet and even drain plug. Get your stuff together, still nice table but I really only got this one for the ruler and there's not a ruler.
customer_reviews.author: Cole D.

customer_reviews.title: Have to wait till spring
customer_reviews.text: Won't know how it worked till summer when he goes fishing to actually use it
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Got for my husband and he’s very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging and brittle top
customer_reviews.text: If you want to purchase one of these, but it from a store where you can examine it first and be very careful taking it home. Extremely poor packaging! Arrived as others have stated with a cracked corner. Decided to keep it and repair the corner as well as i can rather than get a replacement that will probably also arrive with a cracked corner due to ridiculously poor packaging and a top that is very brittle. The product will serve my purpose fine as a fish cleaning station despite what will probably be an unsightly repair.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hester

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Bulky None fold Faucet
customer_reviews.text: This table is very heavy and not very portable. If you need a table to setup and forget this one is ok not good for portability. The faucet does not fold down and is difficult to take in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this table for a little over two years now and absolutely love it! Not only does the table make cleaning fish and other game much less of a chore, it also allows you to keep everything organized and clean. I use this table several times a month at my house and even take it on the beach with me when surf fishing. I always clean it well and it has remained very durable. I would recommend not using the drain hose because it will clog easily. Instead I place a small bucket under the drain hole and that works well. Take care of it and it will make your life easier for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: great! with a few caveats
customer_reviews.text: perfect table for cleaning fish....i set mine up and left it in corner of garage. 2 things to consider: 1 - if you want to take down an d setup, it's a pain to remove faucet. 2 - if the connector hose breaks (as mine did), i had to retrofit a faucet 1/2" X 1/2" with a $5 garden hose X 1/2" male pipe thread. otherwise, very handy.
customer_reviews.author: big joe

customer_reviews.title: Horrible faucet placement
customer_reviews.text: The faucet location is terrible. It is stuck deep between the leg assembly where only finger tips can reach. And no, when you open the legs it doesn't help, it makes it worse as it is the corner where the legs attach. It is not possible to hand hand tighten with any sore of ease. Faucet would be better at middle edge of table where legs open and leave plenty of room to use both hands. The other features (thickness, ease, and weight) are okay, however ,the rating system does not include rating the facet or drain. which in itself is a red flag. Buy a table with the faucet in the center edge.
customer_reviews.author: Ah

product_meta.title: Organized Fishing Lightweight Folding Fillet Table with Locking Legs, Drain Assembly and Faucet, FT-001
product_meta.description: This great looking table is extremely sturdy, and durable. Locking legs are easy to collapse for storage. With the molded in sinkthis unit is great for all kinds of chores. Simply hook up to the garden hose, and youare ready to go!
feature_bullets: Food-grade plastic top measures 44.75 inches by 23.5 inches
Stainless steel faucet with graden hose attachment included
Easily folds up for storage or transport
